name:
Let's play a game to help you 
 understand the gameplay better
You may swipe Left or Right on the card to choose the correct option

question.question_text: Did India win the Cricket WC in 2011?
question.question_context: Both India and Sri Lanka made it to the finals of the ICC World Cup in 2011. Did India manage to get the victory?

name:
Some questions may have a 3rd option 
 Swipe up, or click on the button to choose it

question.question_text: Did India win the Cricket WC in 2011?
question.question_context: Both India and Sri Lanka made it to the finals of the ICC World Cup in 2011. Did India manage to get the victory?

name: Questions have positive (+10) and negative (-4) points. Swipe to see how you scored!

question.question_text: Did India win the Cricket WC in 2011?
question.question_context: Both India and Sri Lanka made it to the finals of the ICC World Cup in 2011. Did India manage to get the victory?

name: Powerups are a way to improve your score! They are located at the bottom of your screen

question.question_text: Did India win the Cricket WC in 2011?
question.question_context: Both India and Sri Lanka made it to the finals of the ICC World Cup in 2011. Did India manage to get the victory?

name: Tap on a powerup to apply it to the question
And that's it! Easy as that! Now you can go ahead and play your next game or replay this one
